member.summary: Specifies where the drop-down button goes.

member.name: F:DataTools.MessageBoxEx.DropDownPlacement.None
member.summary: No drop-down menu. Items in the DropDownMenu list are ignored.

member.name: F:DataTools.MessageBoxEx.DropDownPlacement.Left
member.summary: There is a down-arrow button placed immediately to the left of the button that will act as the trigger for the drop-down menu.

member.name: F:DataTools.MessageBoxEx.DropDownPlacement.Right
member.summary: There is a down-arrow button placed immediately to the right of the button that will act as the trigger for the drop-down menu.

member.name: M:DataTools.MessageBoxEx.MessageBoxEx.Show(DataTools.MessageBoxEx.MessageBoxExConfig)
member.summary: Shows a message box according to a MessageBoxExConfig object. Custom return values will be found in the config object after the dialog box closes. This method allows more flexibility in how your dialog box behaves.
member.param: The MessageBoxExConfig object to use to configure the dialog box.

member.name: T:DataTools.MessageBoxEx.MessageBoxExConfig
member.summary: Configuration object to be passed to MessageBoxEx.Show() containing parameters and customization options for the dialog box.

member.name: P:DataTools.MessageBoxEx.MessageBoxExConfig.CustomButtons
member.summary: List of custom buttons. Default buttons arae only displayed if this list is empty.

member.name: P:DataTools.MessageBoxEx.MessageBoxExConfig.MessageBoxType
member.summary: Specifies the message box type.

member.name: P:DataTools.MessageBoxEx.MessageBoxExConfig.MuteSound
member.summary: Specifies whether to mute alert sounds.

member.name: P:DataTools.MessageBoxEx.MessageBoxExConfig.SoundIcon
member.summary: Play a custom sound when the dialog box opens, regardless of the default sound for the selected icon.

member.name: P:DataTools.MessageBoxEx.MessageBoxExConfig.Icon
member.summary: Specifies the icon displayed to the left of the message, in the message box.

member.name: P:DataTools.MessageBoxEx.MessageBoxExConfig.CustomIcon
member.summary: Specifies the custom icon to display.

member.name: P:DataTools.MessageBoxEx.MessageBoxExConfig.Title
member.summary: Specifies the title of the dialog box.

member.name: P:DataTools.MessageBoxEx.MessageBoxExConfig.Message
member.summary: Specifies the message to be displayed.

member.name: P:DataTools.MessageBoxEx.MessageBoxExConfig.OptionText
member.summary: Toggle option text. If this text is not null, either a url or a checkbox will be displayed. The state of the toggle when the dialog closes can be found in the OptionResult property. In Url mode this can be any file or process that you have permission to start.

member.name: P:DataTools.MessageBoxEx.MessageBoxExConfig.OptionMode
member.summary: The mode of the option text. Default is checkbox. In Url mode the OptionText can be any file or process that you have permission to start.

member.name: P:DataTools.MessageBoxEx.MessageBoxExConfig.UrlClickDismiss
member.summary: Specify whether or not clicking the Url dismisses the dialog box. The default result will be returned.

member.name: P:DataTools.MessageBoxEx.MessageBoxExConfig.OptionTextUrl
member.summary: The URL linked to the option text.

member.name: P:DataTools.MessageBoxEx.MessageBoxExConfig.CustomResult
member.summary: The custom result of the button that was pressed.

member.name: P:DataTools.MessageBoxEx.MessageBoxExConfig.OptionResult
member.summary: The state of the checkbox when the dialog box was closed.
